Hi (Persons name)

We recently noticed that our WELCOME20 discount code was listed on the site but wasn't working properly. We're happy to let you know that this has now been fixed!
You can now use the WELCOME20 code at checkout to receive $20 off your order, just as intended.
If you tried to use the code earlier and it didn't work, please feel free to complete your purchase now with the updated discount.
We apologise for the inconvenience.
Sarah

Hi Sarah,

Sure, can you please check the below:

Subject: Welcome! Enjoy $20 Off Your First Order 🎉
Hi [First Name],
Thanks for signing up! As a welcome gift, here’s $20 off your first order.
Simply enter the code WELCOME20 at checkout to apply your discount.
If you have any questions or need help, we’re just a message away. Enjoy shopping!

Let me know if you’d like to make any tweaks to the message or if you’re happy for us to set this up in Gravity for all new sign-ups moving forward.

Hi Sarah,

Just a quick update — the WELCOME20 discount code that was previously listed on the site but not functioning correctly has now been fully configured and tested in WooCommerce.

Customers can now use it to receive $20 off their order as intended.

We've drafted the following email to send to affected customers. Please review and let us know if you're happy with the message below. Once approved, we'll go ahead and trigger the notification through Gravityforms:

Subject: Your $20 Discount Code Is Now Working!

We recently noticed that our WELCOME20 discount code was listed on the site but wasn’t working properly. We’re happy to let you know that this has now been fixed!

You can now use the WELCOME20 code at checkout to receive $20 off your order, just as intended.

If you tried to use the code earlier and it didn’t work, please feel free to complete your purchase now with the updated discount.

Let us know if you’d like to make any changes to the message. We're happy to adjust it as needed.

Hi all

The $20 voucher is not working - can you please correct this.

I think you will need an email to the customer to explain the $20 voucher - do you have this written?

Thanks all

Sarah
